Class GPSUnit

  • java.lang.Object
    • GPSUnit

  • public class GPSUnit
extends java.lang.Object
    A GPSUnit object knows its location and its heading,so it calculates movement along th x and y coordinates and update degree from old data to new one.
    Author:
    Adilet Momunaliev
